description:
Make fun videos wherever you are, with photos and video clips from your Camera Roll. Choose from one of our sleek video styles, add a song, and you’re done! Share via Messages, email, Twitter, and Facebook and impress the socks off your friends and family. 

Over 1 million downloads and counting! Featured in the WSJ, NYTimes, NBC, Wired, CNN, National Geographic, and more. 

ADD PHOTOS AND VIDEO CLIPS
• Choose photos and video clips from your camera roll
• Import from iCloud and Dropbox

PERSONALIZE YOUR VIDEO
• Over 50 different video styles to choose from 
• Hundreds of songs in our built-in music library
• Captions for photos, video clip trimmer, and intro/outro cards  

SHARE WITH FAMILY AND FRIENDS
• Easy sharing via Messages, email, Twitter, and Facebook

ANIMOTO PLUS
• Create longer videos
• Download to your device
• Add longer video clips

Animoto is always free to use, but is even better when paired with an Animoto Plus subscription, which enables more powerful video creation and sharing features. Animoto Plus is available through an auto-renewing subscription. 

Subscription options include: 

- Animoto Basic (paid monthly) for $6.99 
- Animoto Basic (paid yearly) for $41.99 

Subscriptions will be charged to your credit card through your iTunes account. Your subscription will automatically renew unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of your current subscription, and you cannot cancel a subscription during the active period. You can manage your subscription at any time, either by viewing your account in iTunes from your Mac or PC, or Account Settings on your device after purchase. 

Animoto’s Privacy Policy is available within the app and at http://animoto.com/legal/privacy_policy.
releaseNotes:
Easily tell how many photos & video clips fit in your video. Create 30 second videos for free or upgrade to fit up to 300 photos, video clips and text cards.

With occasional bug fixes and updates, we're making it even better for you to make awesome videos.
